argument.description: An expression that specifies the string in which the search is to take place.

An expression that specifies the string in which the search is to take place.
An expression that specifies the string in which the search is to take place.

description: The REGEXP_LIKE scalar function returns a boolean value indicating if the regular expression pattern is found in a string. The function can be used only where a predicate is supported.
sample:
SELECT EMPNO FROM EMPLOYEE
      WHERE REGEXP_LIKE(LASTNAME,'luc+?hes+?i','i')
